Flares.help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.
Flares.targetHelp: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

Fire_Breath.help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.
Fire_Breath.targetHelp: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Rain_of_Fire.help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long
Rain_of_Fire.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Blaze.help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Warmth.help: You can use your Warmth to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Cauterize.help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Melt_Armor.help: The searing Heat from this power is enough to Melt the Armor and defenses of all targets in the affected area. Melt Armor significantly weakens the Defense and Damage Resistance of the affected targets. Recharge: Long
Melt_Armor.targetHelp: Your Defense and Damage Resistances have been reduced.
Melt_Armor.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Defense and Damage Resistance of {PlayerDest}.
Melt_Armor.victimHit: {PlayerSource} melts your armor lowering your defenses and damage potential.

Inferno.help: Unleashes a massive fiery explosion to devastate all nearby enemies and set them ablaze. Inferno deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Inferno.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!
